response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds significant value for me, but given its importance to you, I believe it deserves to be in the hands of someone who truly appreciates it. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $10,000. I trust that this price reflects both the value I place on the product and the immense benefit it would bring to you. Let's make this opportunity a win-win scenario.", "product_price": 10000}
